title: Evelynn Login Theme
body:
Pretty cool/gorgeous, and it definitely suits her!
I kinda wish the piano music was in there somewhere though.

EDIT: This login was animated by Lil PeanutBrotha, if you're interested in seeing more of his MoGFX work on champions you should check out his portfolio :) https://vimeo.com/user2345621

replies.body: I love how the theme is both alluring and frightening at the same time; the inclusion of her laugh at different points in the music is also a really wonderful. it really fits her intended style and the ending is just bomb af

Holy crap, that's awesome. It both draws me in, but also gives that feeling that something's wrong. The only thing that would make it better would be if when it gets darker in the image she looks a bit more like her true form, like horns appearing or something. Other than that, it's perfect.
This login was animated by Lil PeanutBrotha, if you're interested in seeing more of his MoGFX work on champions you should check out his portfolio :) https://vimeo.com/user2345621

I hope we won't have circle jerk whining because people put expectation where there was no reason to even believe the piano part would mean it is her theme.

On the topic, I think it is a very creepy and ambiant music that suit her well.

Well to be fair, VGU teasers have played login themes for reveal trailers in the past. Urgot's reveal was part of his login and it was dope when we got the full thing. WW's teaser played his blood scent theme near the end, which then showed up in his gameplay. 

Evelynn's expected theme was a beautiful piano piece at the end, which honestly set the mood for the character more then the actual gameplay part of the teaser (a romantic setting where a demon lies to allure), however that music note isn't present in any other form, hell it could've just been an intro theme playing when you play eve, kinda like jhin has his music at the start of a game. 

Since its not in the gameplay, it was safe to assume it was her login but... it isn't anything like it... its NOT BAD and I do like it, infact might be one of my favorites, but its fair enough that our expectations were let down for what they were. Can't complain myself because I'm happy with the substitute.

I don't know, it is not like I was "smart" for not believing it, it is more like I already saw people acting like the piano theme WOULD BE her theme that I immediately though "With our luck, they are going to do something different and people will biatch".

Maybe also because the teaser music really felt like a music teaser and not like a standalone part of a song? You know, by the way it is construct.

I'm a little confused as to WHY not having the piano melody as her login screen is disappointing.  

It's not as if something is now lost. Both the piano piece and her login theme exist. Is it because people wanted to hear the full teaser composition?  

As it stands we now have TWO songs for Evelynn. We've gotten more content. How is that disappointing?

I'm very disappointed because I was hoping for the teaser music.
I hope they will release it somewhere.
They do if it happens to be distinct from the login theme. They did it for Jhin's teaser.
Stuff gives me chills
Ikr, ugh <3 It's wonderful

Sounds close enough to Eve's voice to make it very possible to imagine it's something she may hum or sing to draw people near, and the whole essence of this song is very Siren-esque, though I know she isn't one in the technical sense.
how long are we going to wait for the patch?
I think riots patches every two weeks. So we should expect Evelynn to release early next week, tuesday or wednesday probably. Someone please correct me if I'm wrong.
Honestly expected the next Kindred login theme. Quite disappointing...
Its great, quite creepy, but still a beautifull and almost aluring, like the hypnotic sing of a siren

Nothing really frightens me much, so I can't say whether the creepy vibe is fulfilled. But the theme is smooth, dreary, and the breath-like wisp overlaying the music worked great together in harmony.

Good stuff. Another rousing success by the music team!
amazing music and animation.
LOL go look at the Korean login for eve. Its censored {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

awesome! on point riot! fits her perfectly and one of the best themes ever!

I think that would be cool on release.

This login theme is alluring and terrifying just like Evelynn. You feel drawn in and comforted but at the same time you're uneasy because the tone is almost too serene and tranquil; like when the entire forest becomes quiet at the presence of a predator. There are red flags screaming in the back of your head to leave, but she just keeps drawing you in. I fucking love it.
This would sound god damn wonderful as a holloween theme dude!

Ed... you never disappoint do you?! like...ever!

this theme gave me goosebumps, especially at 1:50 

and that animated artwork is just beautiful.
So this is good but it doesn't match the teaser, what is the teaser music?

I'm happy.

Granted there's no piano

but I can't say because of that I don't like it, actually a new favorite login. 

Logins with vocals were always really good and huge favorites for me.

I am personally very disappointing in this theme. There are elements that fit Evelynn, but it does not fit a stealth seductress type champion. The voice is great, but the use of the percussion and guitars just doesn‚Äôt do it for me. Why weren‚Äôt there any walking sound effects? Her heels would be a great percussive element. It should be about the mystery of an unknown threat (even elements of silence would be great), not about the blatant overbearing threat that exists in this theme. I do not envision Evelynn when I listen to this theme.
